name: CicadaIG
title: The Cicada Vaccine Forecasting Engine and Guide
description: Example Implementation Guide for using the CDC's Clinical Decision Support for Immunization

resource.name: Allergy Intolerance Profile for Immunization Decision Support
resource.description: Profile for allergy intolerances relevant to immunization. The code (allergen/substance) may use SNOMED CT or ICD-10-CM. Reaction substances may use CVX, MVX, SNOMED CT, or RxNorm.

resource.name: Allowed Interval Reason
resource.description: Captures the reason for the allowed interval between vaccine doses.

resource.name: Allowed Interval Status
resource.description: Captures the status of the allowed interval for vaccination.

resource.name: Allowed Vaccine Reason
resource.description: Captures the reason why a particular vaccine is allowed.

resource.name: Allowed Vaccine Status
resource.description: Indicates if the vaccine administered is allowed under certain conditions.

resource.name: AssessmentDate
resource.description: The date on which the vaccination assessment was made.

resource.name: Begin Age
resource.description: The age at which the vaccine becomes applicable.

resource.name: CDSI Observation Codes
resource.description: Observations and Conditions that are important to indications or contraindications in vaccine forecasting

resource.name: Condition Profile with Vaccine Condition Codes
resource.description: Profile for conditions where the code must be from the Vaccine Condition Codes value set. Accepts SNOMED CT and ICD-10-CM coded conditions.

resource.name: Dose of a Vaccine
resource.description: Detailed information about each vaccination dose.

resource.name: End Age
resource.description: The age at which the vaccine is no longer applicable.

resource.name: Evaluation Reason
resource.description: The reason for the evaluation.

resource.name: Evaluation Reason
resource.description: The reason for the evaluation.

resource.name: Evaluation Status
resource.description: The status of the result of an evaluation.

resource.name: Evaluation Status Value Set
resource.description: Value Set for the status of the result of an evaluation.

resource.name: ICD-10-CM to CDSi Observation Code Map
resource.description: Maps ICD-10-CM diagnosis codes to CDSi observation codes used in immunization decision support.

resource.name: Immunization Procedures Profile
resource.description: Profile for medical procedures related to immunization based on SNOMED CT or CPT codes.

resource.name: Immunization-Relevant Medications (RxNorm)
resource.description: RxNorm codes for medications relevant to immunization decision support, including antivirals and aspirin.

resource.name: Immunization-Relevant Procedures (CPT)
resource.description: CPT codes for procedures relevant to immunization decision support, including splenectomy and cochlear implant.

resource.name: Inadvertent Administration Status
resource.description: Indicates if the vaccine was administered inadvertently.

resource.name: Interval Reason
resource.description: This value set includes codes for the reason an interval is considered to be invalid.

resource.name: Interval Reason
resource.description: This value set includes codes for the reason an interval is considered to be invalid.

resource.name: Lab Evidence of Immunity (LOINC)
resource.description: LOINC codes for laboratory tests that provide evidence of immunity, mapped to CDSi observation codes for immunization decision support.
Define the usage of FHIR resource types with specific aliases
resource.name: MapVaccineCodes
Medication Administration Profile with Vaccine Codes
resource.description: Profile for medication administrations with vaccine codes from CVX or MVX.

resource.name: Medication Dispense Profile with Vaccine Codes
resource.description: Profile for medication dispenses with vaccine codes from CVX or MVX.

resource.name: Medication Request Profile with Vaccine Codes
resource.description: Profile for medication requests with vaccine codes from CVX or MVX.

resource.name: Medication Statement Profile with Vaccine Codes
resource.description: Profile for medication statements with vaccine codes from CVX or MVX.

resource.name: Medications
resource.description: Value set for medications and substances based on SNOMED CT, including both active ingredients and marketed products.

resource.name: Observation Profile for Immunization Decision Support
resource.description: Profile for Observation resources carrying lab evidence of immunity or other findings relevant to immunization decisions. Codes may be from SNOMED CT, ICD-10-CM, or LOINC.

resource.name: Preferred Interval Reason
resource.description: Captures the reason for the preferred interval between vaccine doses.

resource.name: Preferred Interval Status
resource.description: Indicates if the vaccine was administered at the preferred interval.

resource.name: Preferred Vaccine Reason
resource.description: Captures the reason why a particular vaccine is preferred.

resource.name: Preferred Vaccine Status
resource.description: Indicates if the vaccine administered is the preferred vaccine.

resource.name: Procedures
resource.description: Comprehensive Value Set for medical procedures based on SNOMED CT codes.

resource.name: Reasons why certain doses are Preferred or Allowed doses
resource.description: Reasons why certain doses are Preferred or Allowed doses

resource.name: Reasons why certain doses are Preferred or Allowed doses
resource.description: Reasons why certain doses are Preferred or Allowed doses

resource.name: SNOMED CT to CDSi Observation Code Map
resource.description: Maps SNOMED CT codes to CDSi observation codes used in immunization decision support.

resource.name: Vaccination Conflict
resource.description: Indicates any conflicts with other vaccinations.

resource.name: Vaccination Patient
resource.description: A profile that extends the base FHIR Patient resource to include detailed vaccination-related information.

resource.name: Vaccine
resource.description: Simple vaccine to easily obtain needed information for forecasting

resource.name: Vaccine Condition Codes
resource.description: Value set for conditions based on SNOMED CT, that may impact immunization.

resource.name: Vaccine Condition Codes (ICD-10-CM)
resource.description: Value set for conditions based on ICD-10-CM that may impact immunization decisions, mapped to CDSi observation codes.

resource.name: Vaccine Gender
resource.description: Value set for gender categories relevant to vaccination data.

resource.name: Vaccine Gender
resource.description: Value set for gender categories relevant to vaccination data.

resource.name: Vaccine Type
resource.description: Type of the vaccine.

resource.name: Valid Age Reason
resource.description: Captures the reason why the vaccine was administered at a particular age.

resource.name: Valid Age Reason
resource.description: Value set for reasons why a patient's age is considered valid/invalid for a vaccine.

resource.name: Valid Age Reason
resource.description: Value set for reasons why a patient's age is considered valid/invalid for a vaccine.

resource.name: Valid Age Status
resource.description: Indicates if the vaccine was administered at the correct age.
